sentences.en: A broken rib had perforated her lung.
sentences.cn: 一根肋骨骨折，刺穿了她的肺部。

sentences.en: I refused to wear headphones because they can perforate your eardrums.
sentences.cn: 我不愿戴耳机，因为它可能会使鼓膜穿孔。

sentences.en: In advanced stages the opaque corneas may ulcerate and even perforate.
sentences.cn: 在疾病后期,不透明的角膜可能产生溃疡,甚至穿孔.

sentences.en: In communications, a manual switching system where incoming messages to the switching center perforate paper tape.
sentences.cn: 在通信技术中, 一种人工信息[报文]交换方法,即进入交换中心的(信息)报文用手工在纸带上穿孔.

sentences.en: The Ascaris adults may perforate a suture line or cause a bile or pancreatic duct obstruction.
sentences.cn: 成虫可穿破缝线或引起胆管或胰腺管阻塞.

sentences.en: This machine can perforate the sheets of stamps.
sentences.cn: 这台机器能在整版邮票上打孔.

sentences.en: Water - power deep penetrator system can perforate clearly drainage channel utilizing the principle of pressure jet cutting.
sentences.cn: 水力深穿透射孔系统利用高压水射流钻孔的方式实现深穿透射孔.

words.tran_cn: 茎贯穿叶而生长的；贯穿性的；[植] 抱茎状的

trans.tran_en: to make a hole or holes in something

trans.tran_cn: 穿孔于，在…上打眼，（在纸张等上）打齿孔[孔眼线]
